Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb
メッセージボックス作成.lsb

Event.EventArg: …At the end of times, when the stars grow dim,
the God of Creation shall forsake His people.
The spirits of the dead shall wander the earth and the sea,
In vain shall they search the four corners of the Earth,
until finally they see the truth.
Then there shall be great desolation among the spirits of the dead.
The Spirit Demea shall speak to them:
Therefore, it now falls to us to protect all living things."
But some dark spirits shall reply:
"God is gone. Wherefore, then, shall we concern ourselves
with the dumb beasts of the earth?
All of Heaven and Earth can be ours, and we can do as we will."
These spirits shall renounce the Sun, and leave,
and gather on the dark side of the Earth.
There shall they rule, there shall they call themselves

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb
メッセージボックス作成.lsb
